course.subject: ISOM
course.name: IS Doctoral Seminar: IS Research Opportunities - Disciplinary Interfaces
course.description: This course offers a survey of current research involving information systems. The purpose of this seminar is to familiarize students with the current academic discourse involving information systems and related areas for students to conduct or inform students' independent research in these areas. Part of the course will introduce students to applications of control theory and differential games.
